response.overview: Pojaman, a young girl who is proud of her dignity and origin, even though she is just an ordinary person, has to leave the garden house to travel to Bangkok to continue her studies according to her father's wishes written before he died, for Pojaman to live with the family of Mom Phan Rai, who is her father's cousin, at Ban Sai Thong. She has been bullied since she moved in, with her mother and Khunying Lek, the younger sister of Chai Klang, as well as all the servants in the house bullying her. Chai Klang felt sorry for her and had Khunying Yai, her eldest sister, help her. Pojaman also took care of and cared for his youngest brother who was crippled. She showed that she was a strong, patient person with a good heart, until she was able to win the heart of Chai Klang and many others, until they were successful. The couple finally got married.
response.title: Ban Sai Thong
